cause.description:
Retorno is a source of spiritual and emotional renewal for Jewish youth and adults in Israel and all over the world who have fallen into a deep abyss and suffer from addictions. During the stay at Retorno, they discover the root causes that led them to their current circumstances and learn how to overcome obstacles, including those they are likely to encounter in the future.
Retorno's Website: http://www.retorno.org/
1. Communities need to work on understanding the nature of addiction, why it happens, and how it can be prevented.
2. There is hope for someone struggling with an addiction.
3. Retorno has helped many people take their lives back into their own hands.
cause.mission: Addiction Prevention and Treatment, legal help, support.
